results.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
results.author: Steve Jobs

results.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
results.author: John Lennon

results.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
results.author: Dalai Lama

results.quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.
results.author: Stephen King

results.quote: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
results.author: Brian Tracy

results.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
results.author: Theodore Roosevelt

results.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
results.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

results.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
results.author: William James

results.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
results.author: Albert Schweitzer

results.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
results.author: Walt Whitman

results.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
results.author: C.S. Lewis

results.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
results.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

results.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
results.author: Alan Kay

results.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
results.author: Sam Levenson

results.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
results.author: Wayne Gretzky

results.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
results.author: Henry Ford

results.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
results.author: Vidal Sassoon

results.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
results.author: Frank Sinatra

results.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
results.author: Henry David Thoreau

results.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
results.author: John D. Rockefeller
